Ontodia.ClearAll.description: Event which should be triggered to delete all elements from the diagram.

Ontodia.FocusOnElement.description: Event which should be triggered to focus on an element.

iri.description: IRI of an entity to be focused on.

Ontodia.OpenConnectionsMenu.description: Event which should be triggered to open navigation menu for target element.

id.description:
ID of element to open navigation menu for.
If provided ID is `undefined` the dialog will be hidden on event.

Ontodia.Save.description: Event which should be triggered to save the diagram.

errorMessage.description: Custom notification message to show when saving the diagram failed.

persistChanges.description: Persist changes, if changes are available

saveDiagram.description: Save current diagram. Cannot be used together with saveDiagramAs.

saveDiagramAs.description: Save diagram as. Cannot be used together with saveDiagram or persistChanges.

successMessage.description: Custom notification message to show when the diagram has been saved.

Ontodia.SetAuthoringMode.description: Event which should be triggered to toggle between view and authoring mode.

authoringMode.description: `true` to use authoring mode; otherwise `false` to use view mode.

Ontodia.ShowElementInfo.description: Event which should be triggered when user requests to show information about an element.

iri.description:
IRI of an entity to show information dialog for.
If provided IRI is `undefined` the dialog will be hidden on event.

Ontodia.StartEntityEditing.description: Event which should be triggered when user initiates editing an entity.

iri.description:
IRI of the entity to start editing with.

If provided IRI is undefined the editing will be stopped.

Ontodia.StartLinkEditing.description:
Event which should be triggered when user initiates editing a link.

If multiple links matches specified restrictions the editing will be stopped.

iri.description: IRI of the link to start editing with.

sourceIri.description: Source of the link to start editing with.

targetIri.description: Target of the link to start editing with.

typeIri.description: Type of the link to start editing with.

Ontodia.StopEditing.description: Event which should be triggered to stop editing an entity or a link.
